casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Quavon TORRES Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 8, 2017

Laurie N. Feldman, special deputy assistant state's attorney, in support of the petition.

Jennifer B. Smith, assigned counsel, in opposition.

The state's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn.App. 138, 167 A.3d 365 (2017), is denied.
